title: Sweetcorn cakes with yoghurt sauce
ingredients: ['75g (2¾ oz) polenta (cornmeal)', '75g (2¾ oz) strong white flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', 'Salt and black pepper', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil, plus extra for greasing', '150ml (5 fl oz) skimmed milk or water', '1 cob fresh sweetcorn, or 125g (4½ oz) canned sweetcorn, or frozen sweetcorn, defrosted', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander', '2 egg whites', 'For the sauce', '150g (5½ oz) low-fat Greek yoghurt', 'Grated zest of 1 lemon', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander']
